name: EX POLARIS
description:
EX POLARIS is an adventure game about a mysterious visit by aliens. Travel through a unique world and put a stop to the destruction of the planet!

 

Visitors from a distant star are trying to get a hold of plans to a super weapon, and it's up to you to stop them.

  Mac and maybe linux versions coming soon™

  Feedback is appreciated! Expect some tweaks and balance changes in the future

  Speedrun record is 10:22
